sentences.sContent: Traffic was disrupted by a hoax bomb.
sentences.sCn: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.sContent: Climate change could disrupt the agricultural economy.
sentences.sCn: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

synos.tran: 破坏；使瓦解；使分裂；使中断；使陷于混乱

remMethod.val: dis(分开) + rupt(打破， 断裂) → 使断裂 → 使中断

words.tran: 破坏的；分裂性的；制造混乱的

trans.tranOther: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems
